suggested_project.title: Signals from the Everyday
suggested_project.description: A collection of whimsical, insightful, or funny micro-stories and observations inspired by modern digital life and subtle human moments.
suggested_project.based_on: watcher favorites: conversational humor (#2079, #2087), daily life observations

decisions: Pause ocean and time themes due to staleness and lack of engagement.
Emphasize humor, modern life, and conversation-based content as these received watcher likes.
Do not start new projects with overused or stale themes.
Propose a new collection project drawing from watcher-liked pieces.
Focus next 20 creations on standalone pieces to probe for new watcher engagement.
Blacklist all permanently disliked content and styles.
